name: Frostbite
description: Like a burn... But the opposite!
effect: Inflict 1 point of wound damage at the end of each Round and reduce the subject's Special by 1. Ice-type Pok√©mon are immune.
duration: Use an action to make a Roll of Vitality + Rank. Add up the successes of these rolls until you get 8, upon which the status is purged.
